title: Drawing, "Landscape with a Medieval Castle", 1880–90
medium:
Recto: Brush and watercolor, graphite on beige laid paper.
Verso: Graphite on beige laid paper.
description:
Horizontal view of ornaments composed of two petals and leaves at left; of two boughs with maple leaf seeds at right; in the top row of two leaf boughs, at left, of several boughs with leaves and a petal at rght in the bottom row.

Verso: A big castle on top of a hill, at center, sloping downward toward the right and the foreground, where two men with spears are shown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Landscape with a Medieval Castle", 1880–90.
1880–90. Recto: Brush and watercolor, graphite on beige laid paper.
Verso: Graphite on beige laid paper.. Gift of Mrs. Samuel Colman. 1939-85-76.
